event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Run <tt>svcs -x</tt> to determine why the service failed and the location of logfiles, if any.
event_registry_properties.name: po-action
event_registry_properties.item: Run 'svcs -x' to determine why the service failed and the location of logfiles, if any.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
A service has failed and is not able to start. The service is misconfigured or otherwise fatally broken. For further information on the problem, run svcs -x:

	# svcs -x
	svc:/network/nfs/server:default (NFS server)
	 State: maintenance since Wed Feb 04 00:14:38 2009
	Reason: Restarter svc:/system/svc/restarter:default gave no explanation.
	   See: http://sun.com/msg/SMF-8000-9C
	   See: nfsd(1M)
	   See: /var/svc/log/network-nfs-server:default.log
	Impact: This service is not running.

The output should reference a more detailed article that will provide more information about the failure.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
description
event_registry_properties.item: A service failed and could not be restarted.
event_registry_properties.name: po-description
event_registry_properties.item: A service failed and could not be restarted.
event_registry_properties.name: title
response
event_registry_properties.item: The service has been placed into the maintenance state.
